_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Summons a magic symbol that oscillates between light and darkness. The magic symbol changes depending on your light/dark state, but does not receive bonuses from Sunfire, Eclipse, or Equilibrium. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount
#cSunfire# - Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#cEclipse# - Damage: #w%, Number of Attacks: #z
#cEquilibrium# - Damage: #y%, Number of Attacks: #v
Critical Rate: +#cr% to all attacks
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Unleash the true might of the Essence of Fire. Only usable while Fires of Creation is active. Attack varies based on the Fire Essence summoned.\nThis skill consumes all the flames, boosting its attack power in proportion to the number of flames consumed. Savage Flame cannot apply the Ignition effect.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
#cPassive Effects#: Gain 1 Flame Charge for each enemy struck that is afflicted by Ignition, up to #y flames.
#cActive Effect# - MP Cost: #mpCon, Flame Cost: #x+ charges, Cooldown: #cooltime sec
[Blazing Lion]: Activates explosion #w2 times, hitting up to #v enemies for #z% damage #w times. Increases Final Damage by #v2% for every Flame Charge over the minimum cost.
[Flame Fox]: Creates #q foxfires that randomly strike #q2 enemies within range. Each foxfire deals #s% damage and can regenerate up to #u2 times. Regenerates #s2 more time for each #u Flame Charge over the minimum cost.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Summon an altar of destructive magic. Once two or more have been placed, the first altar fires an orb of deadly void energy, which travels between the altars, decimating all in its path.
Each orb can only strike a given enemy once until recharged by the next altar. The orbs' travel time is the same regardless of the distance between altars.
Additional altars must be placed within range of the previous altar. Enemies hit are marked with a Dark Brand.
If you use the skill with the Down key while there are no altars placed, you can place 2 altars at once, one at the character's current location and the other in front of the character.
Altar of Annihilation is unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Altar Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
The orb takes 0.8 sec to move to the next altar. After 2 altars, the number of attacks increases by #u for every additional altar.
A new altar can be summoned every #v sec, up to #y altars.
Enemies hit gain Dark Brand.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: #c[Mir Skill]# Mir slams down and savagely attacks the enemy. Unaffected by attack reflection.\n#cMir's skills and fusion skills are not affected by effects that increase attack speed.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Duration: 2.5 sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: #c[Fusion Skill]# Evan infuses Mir with his magic during #cDragon Slam#, causing Mir to briefly grow and release a blast of elemental energy. This skill advances alongside Dragon Slam. Unaffected by attack reflection.\n\c Activates when Evan uses #cElemental Barrage# while Mir is using #cDragon Slam#.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: #c[Fusion Skill]# Mir immediately stops attacking and teleports to Evan, creating a vortex that deals damage to nearby enemies.\nThis skill advances alongside Dragon Slam.\n\c Activates when Evan uses #c[Return]# while Mir is using #cDragon Slam or Wyrmking's Breath.#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Conjure ultra-dense matter out of pure psychic energy, then push it toward the enemy. The faster it moves, the more damage it inflicts. Using the skill again redirects the matter toward yourself, at a reduced speed.\nIf you use Psychic Force downward, the direction changes, but the speed does not increase. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
#cPsychic Point Cost: #ppCon.# Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Attacks more quickly as the object accelerates.
While traveling towards you, the object moves at #w% speed.
Inflicts an additional #u% damage on up to #s enemies, #v times, when the object disappears.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Fires an intense beam of energy that scorches everything in its path. Usable for up to 10 seconds consecutively by holding#c the skill key#. Can move while casting. On hitting an enemy, Lucent Brand is refreshed.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost per Attack: #mpCon, DoT: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount. Damage increased by #bdR% when attacking a boss.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: When Crystal Ignition comes in contact with your crystal, its strength is enhanced, and it fires 3 powerful beams of light in the direction Crystal Ignition is traveling. While using Wings of Glory, it activates automatically even if you don't have a crystal. Levels up alongside Crystal Ignition.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Boss Damage: +#bdR%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\n#cCooldown: 1 sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Summons a mechanical warrior wielding a weapon forged from light. The Templar prepares to attack in Illium's direction, and will not change direction until the attack is made. With sufficient Crystal Charges, it fires a more powerful attack.\nIgnores Attack Reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, DoT: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nIf Crystal Charges reach #y while preparing, or while Wings of Glory is active, Final Damage is multiplied by 2.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Unleash the fury of flame in the form of an enraged spirit. Can be only used when Ifrit is summoned. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cIfrit Lv. 30+#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Attack Duration: #y sec\nDuration increases #t sec per 1 active Fervent Drain\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Summon the devastating frosts of the El Nath Mountains. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, stacks Freeze, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Duration: #time sec\nDeals #y% damage when attacking 1 enemy and stacks Freeze #z time(s)\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Use the power of mytocrystals to form a crystalline spirit and drive your enemies away. Can activate the Reaction skill with the crystalline spirit.
Does not reduce the number of enemies that can be attacked when the Radiant Javelin comes into contact.
Cannot use while Wings of Glory is active.
Required Skill: #cReaction - Destruction II Lv. 1 and above# and #cReaction - Domination II Lv. 1 and above#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, uses 1 crystal shard
A crystalline spirit forms near the mytocrystal for #time sec. Only #z% of Final Damage for the Reaction skill the spirit activates is applied, but if it's the 5th skill, #w% is applied. Not affected by cooldown reset.
Using #cWings of Glory# will disperse the crystalline spirit. Each spirit dispersed in the remaining time increases damage by #u%.
Prepares 1 crystal shard every #q sec up to #y shards.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec
[Passive Effect: Magic ATT: +#madX]

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Master the art of black magic and summon death itself to deal with your enemies. The summon duration gets longer as there are more souls to be sacrificed. The god of death's attack deals damage to enemies even when they are under attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Summon the Grim Harvest, which attacks for #time sec every #w sec. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Use the skill again to re-summon near you. Can be used once every 10 sec.
If the Grim Harvest defeats an enemy, its duration increases by #t sec per enemy. If it hits a boss, its duration increases by #z sec. Duration increased to up to #s sec for each attack.
Attack interval becomes 50% with the #cMaster of Death applied,# but attacks do not increase the skill's duration in that case.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Hurl the embodiment of divine power directly at your enemies. Upon contact with the enemies, the power both damages them and and restores #cparty member HP#.\nAs it disappears, the object transforms into Holy Light, attacking enemies nearby and granting a buff to party members. It disappears immediately if #cthe skill is used again#.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Deals #damage% damage, to up to #mobCount enemies, #attackCount time(s) at every interval, or restores #hp% of the Bishop's max HP for you and your party members that come into contact with the object.
Max Contact Count: #w. Both attacks and recovery consume the contact count.
#cHoly Light:# Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #dot%, Number of Attacks: #z. The Bishop and party members that come into contact with the light will gain a buff that increases damage by #q2% for #time sec, while also increasing damage by #w2% for each remaining contact.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: You received a damage increase buff from the Holy Light.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Use the ultimate combination of light and dark to eviscerate your enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cEnder Lv. 30+#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, activates the Baptism of Light and Darkness #s times consecutively. Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
If the #cEnder# hits the enemy, you gain 1 Sword of Consciousness. If you acquire #x swords, the#c cooldown for Baptism of Light and Darkness resets immediately.#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Blaze through your enemies with the phoenix's symbol of infinite life and death.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, consumes 1 Phoenix Feather every sec
Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
1 Phoenix Feather will be prepared every #z sec. You can have up to #x feathers.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Cast a magical circle to channel the power of the constellations. Magic ATT starts to charge the magic circle when Evan's magic (excluding Spiral of Mana) hits a target, culminating when Magic ATT is full. Unaffected by attack reflection. Only the first attack of Elemental Barrage will have the element applied.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, sets up a magic pentacle for #time sec. Liberation starts when Magic ATT reaches #x, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount times consecutively, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%\n#y Magic ATT will be charged if a skill with an attribute hits a target, but it will #conly be charged once per skill#. Charges 1 Magic ATT when a skill with no attribute hits a target, and there is no charge limit\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Fuse monsters and objects into one and launch them like bullets. A Micro Black Hole forms for a short duration at the end of the attack range and deals additional attacks to nearby enemies. But, two Micro Black Holes cannot exist at the same time.
The Micro Black Hole is unaffected by attack reflection.
You can also use it by pressing the down key+[Psychic Grab] while the monster is lifted up.
Required Skill: #cPsychic Grab 2 Lv. 30#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: #Psychic Point Cost: #ppCon. Attacks the enemies you're lifting and up to #mobCount enemies in front of you to deal #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Charges #ppRecovery Psychic Point slot(s) when the skill hits a boss monster.\n#cMicro Black Hole#: Activates a black hole #s times. Damage: #x%, Max Enemies Hit: #z, Number of Attacks: #y. Charges #u Psychic Point slot(s) when the skill hits a target.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Summons Yuki-musume, a specter who wields intense cold. Yuki-musume helps Kanna attack enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Mana Cost: #epCon, Yuki-onna Duration: #time sec. Yuki-musume assists Kanna, dealing #v% damage to #z enemies 6-8 times. When Yuki-musume is summoned, Kanna's mana consumption is reduced by #x% and #y% HP is recovered on every attack.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: The Beast Tamer's animal friends join forces to attack the enemy. Pressing the skill button repeatedly will perform a joint attack, with the last animal friend unleashing a powerful special attack. You can use the directional keys during the skill to determine which animal will inflict the final strike.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Beast Tamer's four animal friends attacks the enemy consecutively.
Lai - Regular Attack: attacks 8 enemies 3 times dealing #x% damage, Special Attack: attacks 8 enemies 6 times dealing #y% damage.
Fort - Regular Attack: attacks 6 enemies 2 times dealing #z% damage, Special Attack: attacks 4 enemies 3 times dealing #w% damage, then attacks 1 enemy 8 times dealing #s% damage.
Eka - Regular Attack: attacks 8 enemies 10 times dealing #v% damage, Special Attack: attacks 15 enemies over a large range 10 times, dealing #q% damage.
Arby - Regular Attack: attack 8 enemies 1 time dealing #u% damage, Special Attack: periodically attack 8 enemies 4 times dealing #a% damage, creates a tree that reduces damage taken by nearby allies by #q2%, Tree Duration: #s2 sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Summons a Spiritstone that amplifies the abilities of you and your party. It grows more powerful as it absorbe mana. The effects of Spirit's Domain do not stack.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
Mana Cost: #epCon, Spiritstone Duration: #time sec
#c[Basic Effect]# Deals #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies within range #attackCount times every #attackDelay sec. Periodically restores #y% of Max HP/MP, Final Damage +#x%, Status Resistance +#w
The Spiritstone grows more powerful with every #z mana absorbed from the caster, boosting its Basic Effect up to 3x.
When the Spiritstone is at full power, party members within range gain 2 Attack Speed, and the mana cost of the caster's skills are reduced to 0.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Calls a herd of critter cubs to your aid. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec. Summons between #x and at most #y groups of critter cubs, depending on the number of enemies within range.
Cubs periodically attack 3 times dealing #damage% damage.
When time runs out the cubs attack, dealing #selfDestruction% damage to as many as #mobCount enemies #z times
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Conjures a magic circle that releases spirits wrongfully sacrificed to perform evil spells. After 5 uses, you can call forth an even larger circle.
Unaffected by attack reflection.
You cannot summon the circle yourself. It is periodically activated when you use the following skills:
#cShikigami Haunting and Vanquisher's Charm#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
Mana Cost: #epCon, periodically summons a giant magic circle, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.
The magic circle will disappear either when it moves a certain distance or reaches the top of the map, and souls that deal #y% damage #z times to #x enemies will appear in up to #u locations.
The giant magic circle summons souls in up to #u2 locations.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Your animal friends zoom in on an airplane and attack the enemy mercilessly. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, periodically attacks #x times, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nRecovers #u HP for you and nearby allies and ignores abnormal status.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Punish the wicked in the name of Heaven.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost per Attack: #mpCon, Consumes 1 holy light per sec.
Attacks up to #mobCount enemies to the front, for #damage% damage, #attackCount times. While Righteously Indignant is active, increases the number of attacks by #w.
1 holy light is prepared every #t sec, and you can hold up to #y at a time.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Immerse your surroundings in dark magic to gather up black lightning. When Dark Shock is active, using Teleport will activate Abyssal Lightning instead.
Creates a netherworld passage around the Battle Mage periodically. Pressing a directional button will teleport you to the nearest passage in that direction, then close that passage.
During your teleportation, black lightning will flash in your wake, damaging any enemies in reach and afflicting them with Dark Brand. Unaffected by attack reflection.
Required Skill: #cDark Shock Lv. 20 and above

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, invincible during casting and disarmament
Duration: #time sec, periodically creates #s netherworld passages, the passages remain for #v sec, and up to #u can exist in the map.
#cBlack Lightning#: Mp Cost: #w, Lightning Created: #z times, Max Enemies Hit: #u2, Damage: #s2%, Number of Attacks: #v2, Critical Rate: #cr%, Enemy DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Final Damage: #q% only when activating instead of Dark Shock
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Summon the fire of a playful salamander spirit.
Salamander tracks a nearby enemy to attack when a direct skill attack by Blaze Wizard hits. In a single action, it either consumes all of the number of attacks or returns to the summoner's location when it strays too far.
Obtain Ember every time Salamander's attack hits, and Salamander's attack becomes stronger in proportion. You can get a Magic ATT increase buff in return for the Ember when Salamander disappears. This buff is not affected by Buff Freezer effects.
Unaffected by attack reflection, and prioritizes boss with highest Max HP but Ignition effect cannot be applied.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Salamander Summon Duration: #time sec, Damage: #damage%, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. In a single action, consumes #v MP and attacks by bouncing up to #u times.
Obtain Ember every time Salamander's attack hits. Final Damage of Salamander's attack increases by #w% for every #y Ember. Up to #z Ember can be obtained.
When Salamander disappears, Magic ATT increases by #dot for #u2 sec, and Magic ATT additionally increases by #w2 for every #subTime Ember.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Launch orbs full of the thunder god's power directly at your enemies.\nThe orb goes inside the enemy it touched to deal continuous shock damage. An electric current flows periodically around that enemy to attack others. If the enemy touched by the orb dies or disappears, another one appears in the location of the enemy and moves.\nThe orb disappears if it consumes all of the max number of shocks or moves beyond a certain distance. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Enemy touched by orb is stunned #attackCount times with #damage% damage at fixed intervals. Max Number of Shocks: #x, reduces Freeze stacks for every #v stuns.\nElectric current flows around shocked enemy, attacking #prop enemies #dot times with #s% damage periodically.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec, cooldown reduced by #t sec for every number of shocks that didn't activate.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Bring down enemies with immense gravitational forces.\nAttacks enemy with the highest Max HP and grants a debuff. The debuffed enemy attacks by pulling in surrounding enemies or objects. The more enemies or objects are pulled in, the distance is reduced and the power is increased.\n#cIf the debuffed enemy disappears# or it's a flying enemy, a gravity orb appears to carry out the rule. All attacks except for the first attack of Law of Gravity are unaffected by attack reflection, and using the skill again can immediately end the debuff or gravity orb.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
#cPsychic Point Cost: #ppCon#, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Debuff Duration: #time sec
Periodically attacks up to #z enemies with #x% damage #y times and pulls them in. Reduces the activation interval up to #prop times in proportion to the number of enemies pulled in so far, and Final Damage of the attack increases by #range%. If there is #cno enemy to pull in#, objects will get pulled in instead. It will be regarded as pulling in the same number of enemies as the max number of enemies that can be attacked.
Upon ending, it explodes to attack up to #v enemies with #w% damage #u times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Using advanced crystal technology, create passages you can move through freely. When you press the up key from the Crystal Gate that you activated, you can move to the #cnext Crystal Gate that is set up from this Crystal Gate#. If you #cuse the last Crystal Gate that is set up, you will move back to the first Crystal Gate#.\nThe gates must be recharged after each use, and the gates that you actually used will take longer to recharge. You can receive enhancement and attack support buffs around the Crystal Gate, and it can also be set up in the air.\nNot affected by Buff Freezer effects, and moving through the passage is included as a necessary distance to activate the flow of combat.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max Crystal Gates: #prop, activates after setting up at least #y. #cThe setup time and the Crystal Gate duration are the same.# After using it once, all Crystal Gates cannot be used for #v sec and Crystal Gates you actually used cannot be used for #u sec.
Periodically obtain Magic ATT +#s buff for #u2 sec around the Crystal Gate.
Direct skill attacks that hit during the buff will bombard #v2 times through the Crystal Gate up to #s2 enemies with #q2% damage. Cooldown: #t sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: You can receive buff and attack support while near the Crystal Gate.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Utilize the Mana Burst's pentacle to allow clusters of mana to swirl with the speed of a tornado on their own. Can be activated by pressing the down key and using Mana Burst again after 1 hit while Mana Burst IV is in use.\nThere can be only 1 Spiral of Mana. When active, using Mana Burst IV temporarily reduces the number of attacks of Spiral of Mana. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cMana Burst IV Lv. 30 and above#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Upon using Mana Burst IV, reduces Spiral of Mana number of attacks by #y for #w sec
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec
[Passive Effect: Magic ATT: +#madX]

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Unleash a fatal poison on a chain of enemies. Poisoned enemies periodically release clouds of additional poison, damaging both themselves and other nearby enemies.\nEven if they survive the initial explosion, the poison effect stacks, raisnig the power of further explosions. If an enemy dies or disappears before an explosion, the poison spreads to nearby enemies immediately. Once a certain number of explosions has occurred, the poison will wear off from every enemy simultaneously.\nDoesn't activate Elemental Drain, and poison is unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Poison Duration: #y sec. Explosion from poisoned enemy attacks #v times with #q% damage periodically, and spreads to #x enemies nearby that aren't poisoned.
Poison accumulates up to #z times. Explosion damage increases #s%p each in proportion to the accumulated poison.
Explosion can occur up to #w times on 1 enemy and up to #u times on all enemies in total.
If it ended because the available explosions were used up, every poison is removed and there is an additional explosion.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Manifest orbs of both light and darkness. If a #cskill corresponding to light or darkness# hits, an attack corresponding to that attribute will activate from the orb and magic power of the relevant attribute accumulates in the orb. If at least 1 magic power accumulates, the orb can be freed to attack. Prioritizes in attacking the enemy with the highest Max HP. When the magic power of light and darkness is the same to create a balance or the more magic power that is accumulated, the damage increases.\nMagic power #ccannot accumulate while Equilibrium is active#. All attacks from the orb are not affected by the effects of Sunfire, Eclipse, or Equilibrium. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: #c[Passive Effect]#: Damage: #z%, Number of Attacks: #q, Cooldown: #x sec, obtain up to #u magic power per attribute. #cLight#: creates up to #q2 light zone(s) that attacks up to #y enemies. #cDarkness#: fires magic bullets that move back and forth across up to #mobCount enemies.\n#c[Active Effect]#: MP Cost: #mpCon, Cooldown: #cooltime sec\nDuration: #time sec, direct skill attacks create #prop magic orbs, each of which attack 1 enemy, attack activates up to #v2 times. Additional Critical Rate: #cr%. Damage increases by #range%p for each unit of accumulated magic power beyond the first. Cooldown: #u2 sec. #cImbalance#: creates a magic orb that deals #dot% damage. #cBalance#: creates a magic orb that deals #subTime% damage.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Manifest orbs of both light and darkness.

_attributes.name: name
_attributes.value: Ghost Yaksha: Great Oni Lord's Legion

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nOpen a portal to the underworld, calling forth the Great Lord himself to visit his wrath upon the wretched. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
#cMana Cost: #epCon#, invincible during casting and disarmament
#cDuration: #time sec#. Open a portal to the underworld, calling forth the Great Lord himself.
If a 4th or below Ghost Yaksha is dismissed, sacrifice will be accumulated according to the amount of time the ghost was summoned. If the accumulated sacrifice reaches #c#u sec+#, the Great Lord can be summoned.
The Great Lord repeatedly attacks #cup to #mobCount enemies, for #damage% damage, #attackCount time(s).#
Upon re-using the skill, the portal will immediately close, and the Great Lord will perform his final attack, which #cattacks up to #y enemies, for #w% damage, #x time(s).#
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

_attributes.name: name
_attributes.value: Ghost Yaksha: Great Oni Lord's Legion

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nOpen a portal to the underworld, calling forth the Great Lord himself to visit his wrath upon the wretched. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
#cMana Cost: #epCon#, invincible during casting and disarmament
#cDuration: #time sec#. Open a portal to the underworld, calling forth the Great Lord himself.
If a 4th or below Ghost Yaksha is dismissed, sacrifice will be accumulated according to the amount of time the ghost was summoned. If the accumulated sacrifice reaches #c#u sec+#, the Great Lord can be summoned.
The Great Lord repeatedly attacks #cup to #mobCount enemies, for #damage% damage, #attackCount time(s)#.
Upon re-using the skill, the portal will immediately close, and the Great Lord will perform his final attack, which #cattacks up to #y enemies, for #w% damage, #x time(s)#.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

_attributes.name: name
_attributes.value: The Greatest Show on Maple World Is Coming!

_attributes.name: desc

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Creates a zone in which your Attack Power and Magic Attack are increased. This zone is destroyed when you move outside it.\nNot affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Magic ATT: +#indieMadR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Fixes the player's max ATT at 2,000,000 temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec. The player's Max ATT is fixed at #x. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily fixes max MP at 500 to increase damage against Boss Monsters. Not affected by cooldown reset, and cannot be used by classes that do not use MP.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Fixed Max MP: #x MP, Boss Damage: +#indieBDR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily decreases max HP to increase damage against Boss Monsters. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max HP: -#x, Boss Damage: +#indieBDR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Decreases the max MP and ignores a certain percentage of the Defense Rate temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset, and cannot be used by classes that do not use MP.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max MP: -#x%, Ignore DEF: #indieIgnoreMobpdpR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily doubles your Max HP. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max HP: +#indieMhpR%, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily increases Critical Damage. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Critical Damage: +#x%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily nullifies enemy's Defense Rate by a percentage of your Critical Rate. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec. Ignored Defense increases by #x% of your Critical Rate. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily replaces the value of your Critical Rate with the value of the main stat that you invested all of your AP into. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, changes your Critical Rate value to #x% of your main stats. Cooldown: #cooltime sec. (This may end up reducing your Critical Rate.)

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily replaces Knockback Resistance with the value of another stat. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, changes your Knockback Resistance to #x% of one of your main stats, Cooldown: #cooltime sec. (This may end up reducing your Knockback Resistance.)

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily increases your main stats by the sum of all stats. For Xenon, increases the highest stat out of STR, DEX, and LUK. If stats are all the same, increases LUK. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases the main stats by #x% of the sum of all your stats. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Increases STR by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases STR by #x% of your current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Increases DEX by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases DEX by #x% of your current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Increases INT by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases INT by #x% of the current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Increases LUK by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases LUK by #x% of your current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily increases STR by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases STR by #x% of your equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily increases DEX by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases DEX by #x% of your equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily increases INT by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases INT by #x% of the equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of your main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily increases LUK by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases LUK by #x% of your equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily increases attack speed. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Allows you to temporarily deal damage to enemies even when they are under Attack Ignore and attack reflection. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, ignores enemy Attack Ignore and attack reflection effects. Does 100% damage. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Ignores a percentage of enemy Defense Rate, but also decreases your Defense temporarily during attacks. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.name: desc

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Amplifies incoming damage by #x% and reflects it. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Has a chance to cancel all Abnormal Statuses. Not affected by cooldown reset.

_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Grants a #prop% chance to cancel all Abnormal Statuses and be immune to Abnormal Status for 3 sec after use. Does nothing when no Abnormal Statuses are applied. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Magic Attack: +#indieMadR%, Ends when hit, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Periodically recovers HP and MP for 150 sec with the power of Fairy Tears.
Recovery amount increases based on the number of stacks when potions are used during recovery.
Max recovery amount is doubled for Demon Avenger.
1st Time: Recovers 1% of HP and MP per sec up to 1,000.
2nd Time: Recovers 1.5% of HP and MP per sec up to 1,500.
3rd Time: Recovers 2% of HP and MP per sec up to 2,000.
4th Time: Recovers 2.5% of HP and MP per sec up to 2,500.
5th Time: Recovers 3% of HP and MP per sec up to 3,000.

#c2018# is the year of the Golden Dog!

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

(Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Summons #cSilverbristle#, the official animal of Pixel Kingdom. Defeat#c monsters near your level# while Silverbristle is summoned to obtain #c20 Pixel Power# at regular intervals. Silverbristle's energy gradually becomes stronger as you gather Pixel Power. After filling the energy gauge, use the skill once more to#c mount Silverbristle# and attack enemies.  \r\n\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Grants #c20 Pixel Power# at regular intervals when hunting monsters near your level. Use to mount #cSilverbristle# when a sufficient amount of Pixel Power is gathered.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Ride into battle on Silverbristle, the official animal of Pixel Kingdom. Activate once to mount, then again to perform a dash attack. Activate the skill while pressing Up to attack upward. The dash attack can be used from the air, and can be performed with the Jump key.\r\n\r\nMount Duration: 30 sec. 100% Knockback Resistance while mounted. Dash attack deals 2000% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Mount Silverbristle for 30 sec, Grants #indieStance% Knockback Resistance while mounted. \nDash attack deals 2000% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Increases EXP rewards by 200% for 30 sec when hunting monsters.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: [Master Level : 1]\nRide around on a Pirate Turtle mount that can use the double jump skill to move#c very quickly.# #cDouble-click a destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available in some regions, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount in additional regions.)

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Summons the Papyrus of Luck. You have a chance to obtain #cPixel Power# when you defeat monsters in hunting zones with#c monsters near your level# while the Papyrus is active. Obtaining a certain number of Pixel Power, will reveal#c one of the numbers# on the Papyrus's formula. After revealing#c three# numbers and#c completing the formula#, you will get Pixel Power and additional EXP based on the result of the formula.
Press the #cInteract/Harvest key# after completing the formula to randomly rearrange the positions of the numbers you revealed. 

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Defeat monsters near your level to gain #c20 Pixel Power# at regular intervals.\r\nAdds #c1 random number# to the Papyrus equation every #c20th interval#.\r\nUpon completing the formula, you will receive#c1,500 Pixel Power# plus#c bonus EXP# based on the result of the formula (The EXP from the monster which completed the equation is multiplied).

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Activates the Riftbringer. 
Defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones while Riftbringer is active has a chance to grant#c dimensional energy#. Once Riftbringer is completely filled with the#c dimensional energy#, a#c dimensional rift# will open and periodically summon#c Specter# monsters. Defeating these monsters grants#c Glory# and#c bonus EXP#. 

#cRight-click to toggle on/off.#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Defeating monsters near your level opens a#c dimensional rift# which summons Specter Monsters. Defeating these monsters grants #cGlory# and#c bonus EXP.#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Summons a #cPriest of Nerota# to search for Nerota's Relics. While summoned, defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones has a chance to grant #cGlory#. After you have gathered enough Glory, the priest will uncoverone of #cNerota's Relics#. Press the #cInteract/Harves keyt# near this relic to gain #cNerota's Power#. 

#cRight-click to turn On/Off.#
#cYou cannot summon the Priest of Nerota if you have already reached the daily Glory limit.#

_attributes.name: desc

_attributes.name: desc

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Summons a Spisan piloting the#c Kaboom Bomber.# Defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones has a chance to warm up the Kaboom Bomber, granting#c Glory.# The bomber's appearance changes according to its warm up stage. Use the skill# when Warm Up has reached its#c final stage,# to#c deploy# the bomber at your location where it will shoot flames.\r\n\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF. It will stop warming up if you exceed the daily Glory limit.#

_attributes.name: h1
_attributes.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 8 enemies for 250% damage 8 times over 45 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

_attributes.name: h2
_attributes.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 8 enemies in a wide area for 250% damage 8 times for 45 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

_attributes.name: h3
_attributes.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 15 enemies in a wide area for 250% damage 8 times for 45 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

_attributes.name: h4
_attributes.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 15 enemies in a wide area for 250% damage 8 times for 60 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: You can use the World Map Teleport skill while you're riding the Thunder Horse Mount.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a Bouncy Orange Mushroom mount, which can use the double jump skill to move #cvery quickly.# #cDouble-click a destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available in some regions, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount in additional regions.)

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Join the <Neon Mushroom Watch> event in the VIP Hunter Club! If you discover a #cNeon Mushroom# while defeating #cmonsters near your level#, you can earn #c<Sweet 16 Points>#.

If you've already exceeded your daily limit for #c<Sweet 16 Coins>#, the Neon Mushroom Watch will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
If you discover a #cNeon Mushroom# while defeating #cmonsters near your level#, you can earn #c<Sweet 16 Points>#.
- #c100 points# for discovering a #cNeon Spore#
- #c200 points# for discovering a #cNeon Orange Mushroom#
- #c300 points# for discovering a #cNeon Horny Mushroom#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
A VIP Premium service!
A #c7-Star Catered Buffet#, just
for patrons out on the hunt.
As you enjoy the chef's banquet,
you'll earn #c<Sweet 16 Points># just for eating!

If you've already exceeded your daily limit
for #c<Sweet 16 Coins>#,
the #c7-Star Catered Buffet# service
will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
For each #cmonster near your level# that you defeat,
you'll earn #c5<Sweet 16 Points>#.
If you defeat #c200# monsters near your level,
the #c7-Star Catered Buffet# will arrive.
You'll get a delicoius meal, plus 100 #c<Sweet 16 Points>#
just for eating it!

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Fireworks mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.\r\n#cPress the attack key while using the High Altitude Flight skill to set off the fireworks.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a Kidult Shopping mount that can double jump and move #cvery quickly.# #cDouble-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
A service for VIP Prestige members!
#cTherapist Swanson# will come straight to you and rid you of your hunting fatigue.
As you hunt, the #caroma candle# will grow brighter and brighter, until it's #cTherapy Time#. Not only will it help you unwind, but you'll earn #c<Sweet 16 Points># just for relaxing!

If you've already exceeded your daily limit
for #c<Sweet 16 Coins>#,
the #cSpecial Therapy# service
will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
For every 20 #cmonsters near your level# that you defeat, you'll earn #c<Sweet 16 Points># based on the candle gauge.
  #c- Lv. 1: 40 points#
  #c- Lv. 2: 60 points#
  #c- Lv. 3: 100 points#
Upon defeating 300 monsters near your level, Therapy Time will start, and you'll earn many more #c<Sweet 16 Points>#.

#cYou can earn 800 points in Therapy Time, up to 5 times per day.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
A flute once belonging to Baek Gong, now used for training purposes. Eliminate #cmonsters near your level,# and a #cSonic Aura# may appear. 

If you've exceeded the number of #c<Awakening Coins># you can obtain for the day, the training will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: If you eliminate monsters near your level and find Sonic Aura x10, Baek Gong's flute will begin to play, and you'll be able to find more Sonic Aura.\n(Up to #z can be found while the flute is playing.)

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: [Master Level: 1]\n\nAllows you to ride an Alluring Whale mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
A sword that carries Chun Gong's energy. As you proceed with hunting, you can fill up the #cSword Energy# to obtain #c<Awakening Coins>#.

If you've exceeded the number of #c<Awakening Coins># you can obtain for the day, the training will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# to fill up the #cSword Energy# 10 times, and a #cGiant Training Dummy# will be summoned. 
If you eliminate #cthree# Giant Training Dummies, Chun Gong will perform his #csword dance#, allowing you to obtain many <Awakening Coins> at once. 

#c- Upon eliminating each Giant Training Dummy, you'll earn <Awakening Coin> x10.
#c- When Chun Gong performs his sword dance, you'll randomly obtain <Awakening Coin> x #w, #v, or #y.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: [마스터 레벨 : 1]\n더블점프가 가능한 슈퍼스타 예티 라이딩을 타고 이동할 수 있습니다. #c월드맵에서 원하는 목적지를 더블클릭#하면 네비게이션을 따라 해당 위치까지 자동으로 비행합니다. (빅토리아 아일랜드를 비롯한 일부 대륙에서만 자동비행이 가능합니다. #c교관 어빈에게서 비행허가권을 구매#하여 스마트 라이딩 허가 대륙을 확장할 수 있습니다.)

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Fritto fires his revolver to attack enemies.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Bullets hit up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Hit enemies explode to attack up to 3 additional enemies for 40% damage 1 time.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Switch to Pollo on the battleground.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: If used in combination with left and right arrow keys, can switch while dashing. Use the skill without the directional keys to switch in place. Shares cooldown with Pollo's Quick Switch. Cooldown: 4 sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Puppy charges forth to maul enemies.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Puppy charges up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Hit enemies are stunned for 1.5 sec. Cooldown: 5 sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Fritto dances the courtship dance in a chicken suit.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Attacks up to #mobCount nearby enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Hit enemies have reduced speed. Cooldown: 15 sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: The Inferno Wolf escapes and wipes out everything in sight.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: The Inferno Wolf jumps up high and deals #damage% damage to #mobCount enemies in the area in front of it. Hit enemies are stunned for 3 sec. Shares cooldown with Pollo's Fireworks Finale. Cooldown: 50 sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pollo shoots multiple bowgun bolts at enemies.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Shoots bolts to attack up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount time(s).

_attributes.value: Switch to Fritto on the battleground.

_attributes.name: h

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pollo unleashes a dizzying barrage of bowgun bolts to confuse enemies.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Attacks #mobCount enemies in the targeted area, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Cooldown: 15 sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pollo shoots a huge, specially-crafted Gatling Bowgun at the enemies.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Shoots the Gatling Bowgun to attack up to #y enemies for #x% damage 12 times. Hold down the key to keep firing. Attack ends when the key is released. Cooldown: 20 sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: The Inferno Wolf escapes and wipes out everything in sight.

_attributes.name: desc

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Deal three devastating slashes against up to 6 enemies. Has a chance to deal extra damage.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: [1st Hit] Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: 2. [2nd Hit] Damage: #x% Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2. [3rd Hit] Damage: #y%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3. Bonus Damage Chance: #prop%, Bonus Damage: #z%.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Focuses your fury and skill to attack a single enemy.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: The ultimate in destructive blows. Attacks multiple enemies with a guaranteed critical hit. Can instant KO enemies, and Hayato's Critical Rate increases for a short period after use.

_attributes.value: Moves forward while attacking. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Critical Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Critical Rate: +#prop%, Duration: #time sec. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Not quite punchy, but close enough. Leap high into the air and dive down katana-first. Required Skill: Whirlwind Cut Lv. 20

_attributes.name: h

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Hurls a mighty whirlwind forward to toss enemies into the sky. Chapter one of the Battoujutsu technique.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount to sweep up the enemies.

_attributes.name: desc

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Summons a #cFlame Bird# who wants to help save the world. Summon the Flame Bird in a hunting ground where #cmonsters near your level# appear. Defeat monsters when the bird is near to acquire #cFlame Bird's determination#. It counts towards your determination count, and also charges the Flame Bird's Energy. When its Energy is full, use the skill once more to temporarily ride around on the Flame Bird and attack nearby enemies. 

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#
#cYou cannot summon the Flame Bird if you have already collected all the determination you can for the day.#
